question: lee brice holly dunn acm awards compare

ground_truth_answer: Lee Brice and Holly Dunn both received recognition from the Academy of Country Music (ACM) Awards. Holly Dunn was named the ACM's Top New Female Vocalist in 1986, while Lee Brice received nominations for Song of the Year for 'Love Like Crazy' and Single Record of the Year in 2011, as well as Top New Male Artist and Song of the Year for 'A Woman Like You' in 2013, though he did not win these awards.
